goal.ch: This course covers the principles of color science and their applications.
goal.en: This course covers the principles of color science and their applications.

outline.ch: Major topics include color vision, color specification systems, color spaces, light sources, color measurement, color mixing, color rendering, color appearance, color matching and color management.
outline.en: Major topics include color vision, color specification systems, color spaces, light sources, color measurement, color mixing, color rendering, color appearance, color matching and color management.

textbook.ch:
References：
1. R. S. Berns, Billmeyer and Saltzman’s Principles of Color Technology, 3rd ed., Wiley-Interscience (2000).
2. N. Ohta and A. Robertson, Colorimetry: Fundamentals and Applications, Wiley (2005).
3. R. W. G. Hunt and M. R. Pointer, Measuring Colour, 4th ed., Wiley (2011).
4. D. Malacara, Color Vision and Colorimetry: Theory and Applications, 2nd ed., SPIE (2011).
